function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to social services and resources","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to VBDs due to lack of healthcare, preventive measures, and support systems","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, social services, and resources for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, community health workers","People":"Women, elderly, children, disabled, indigenous populations, minorities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, NGOs"},{"Description":"Inequitable health governance and access to diagnosis, treatment, and prevention","Impact":"Systemic vulnerabilities in public health system, leading to inadequate disease surveillance and response","Mitigation":"Establishing effective surveillance, early warning systems, and equitable health governance","Technologies":"Disease surveillance technology, telehealth, digital health records","People":"Low socio-economic status populations","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health organizations, NGOs"},{"Description":"Influence of geography, environment, and culture on health access","Impact":"Geographical and cultural barriers limit access to healthcare and health technologies","Mitigation":"Addressing geographical barriers, promoting cultural competence in healthcare, and improving health technology accessibility","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health units, culturally sensitive health education materials","People":"Populations in remote areas, minority groups","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, cultural organizations"}]}
